suspended.contactSupportPrefix: If you believe this is a mistake, please

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have a question or need help? Get in touch with us.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using the Loafy Club booking platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

accounts.title: 2. User Accounts
accounts.content: To book sessions, you must create an account using Google or Facebook authentication. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for all activities that occur under your account. Accounts found to be violating our guidelines may be suspended or terminated.

bookings.title: 3. Booking & Payment
bookings.content: You may book for yourself plus up to 3 guests per booking. Guests are charged at the same rate as your booking. Payments are processed through Stripe (credit/debit cards) or Vietnamese bank transfer with QR code verification. All prices are in Vietnamese Dong (VND). Payment must be completed within 30 minutes of booking, or your reservation will be automatically cancelled and your spots released to other players.

cancellation.title: 4. Cancellation & Refund Policy
cancellation.content: Cancellation deadlines differ by membership type: Drop-in players must cancel at least 48 hours before the session for a full refund. Subscribers must cancel at least 24 hours before for a ticket refund. Cancellations after these deadlines are non-refundable, but you may transfer your spot to another player. Sessions cancelled by organizers (e.g., due to weather or venue issues) will be fully refunded or tickets returned.

waitlist.title: 5. Waitlist & Subscriptions
waitlist.content: When a session is full, you may join the waitlist. Waitlist priority: subscribers first, then drop-in players by sign-up time. Subscribers get early access to book sessions before they open to drop-in players. Subscription tickets are valid for 3 months with auto-renewal enabled by default (can be cancelled anytime). Referral program: both you and your referred friend receive bonus tickets when they make their first purchase.

conduct.title: 6. User Conduct
conduct.content: You agree to use our platform respectfully and lawfully. Prohibited conduct includes: harassment of other players, repeatedly booking and cancelling (no-shows), providing false payment information, attempting to circumvent payment systems, and any behavior that disrupts sessions or other users' experience. Repeated violations will result in account suspension.

liability.title: 7. Liability & Safety
liability.content: Loafy Club provides a booking platform and is not responsible for injuries that may occur during pickleball sessions. Participants play at their own risk. We recommend appropriate footwear and warm-up before playing. By booking, you acknowledge that pickleball is a physical activity and accept responsibility for your own safety.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms. Significant changes will be communicated via email or platform notification.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at support@loafy.club or through our Contact page.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Loafy Club, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide when creating an account (name, email, profile photo from OAuth provider), booking information (session history, payment records), and technical data (device information, IP address, browser type) for platform functionality and security.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information to: process bookings and payments, send booking confirmations and reminders, improve our platform and services, communicate important updates, and ensure platform security. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We share your information only with: session organizers (name and contact for session coordination), payment processors (Stripe for secure payment processing), and service providers (hosting, email services) who help us operate the platform. All third parties are bound by confidentiality agreements.

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures including encrypted data transmission (HTTPS), secure authentication via OAuth providers, and regular security audits. Payment card information is processed directly by Stripe and never stored on our servers.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: Our platform uses: Supabase for authentication and data storage, Stripe for payment processing, Google Cloud for image verification, and Resend for email communications. Each service has its own privacy policy governing data handling.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to: access your personal data, correct inaccurate information, delete your account and data (available in Account Settings), and opt out of marketing communications. You can manage most of these settings directly in your Account page. For data export requests, contact us at support@loafy.club.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies & Tracking
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for authentication and session management. We do not use advertising cookies or sell data to advertisers. You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings.

changes.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes via email or platform notification. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related questions or concerns, please contact us at support@loafy.club.
